Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear your store's made over 10,000,000G
worth of sales.
<PAGE>
What did you sell to make that amount of
money?

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your store's made over 1,000,000G worth of
sales, hasn't it...?
<PAGE>
You must have put in all kinds of work to get
that done. Congratulations.

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear your store's made more than 100,000G
worth of sales. Congrats.

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I was debating whether to buy this or not, but
I ended up buying it.

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I didn't think I'd end up buying anything this nice
today.

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All done with shopping. Time to head home.

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I don't think I should spend any money today.

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's one thing I want the most, and I don't
know when they're going to stock it...

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eh, they didn't have much of a selection. Kinda
disappointing.

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I should get one of those, and one of
those, and... *mutter*

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's this fake book that's just for decoration...
Yeah, sometimes, I just buy random stuff.

<NAME_MOB_EBBO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I should find something to eat before I go
home.
